FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Local Zoo
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: A place for people to ogle various different animals as they pass through the settlement for fun and profit! +.5 base animal production. +.3 base happiness per day. 350 silver per tax period upkeep.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Wilderness 4: Cloning Lab
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: Why breed or capture animals when you can just grow them in vats? +.5 base animal production. +.25 base research. 400 silver per tax period upkeep.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Wilderness 5: AT Animal Beacon
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: An archotech tower that emits a signal which lures distant animals and calms nearby ones. +100% animal production. 1000 silver per tax period upkeep.
